PromptHero - **Stunning** AI art with prompts included ([link](https://flight.beehiiv.net/v2/clicks/eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..L9avTljXARk_Se7ZlERk48_RQwQ2HqOfJadNATlv-jk))

Prompt Generator - Use AI to help you **create** prompts ([link](https://flight.beehiiv.net/v2/clicks/eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..TeS2A3fsbA0eW99ap4UMsGdWMmFBEwbwn4fxQuOWAUo))

# AGI Productivity Tool

Summarization of Long Article

[Humata](https://www.humata.ai/)

Summarize long papers

Learn Faster. Turn complex technical papers into simply explained summaries. Discover new insights 100X faster.

Instant Q&A

Answer hard questions related to your file. Get easy-to-understand answers instantly.

Write Papers 10X Faster

Automatically create new writing based on your file. Generate detailed insights for reports, papers, and a variety of tasks instantly.

Ask AI anything about your files

ReaderGPT (Chrome Extension)

ChatGPT based Web Page Summariser

[PandaGPT](https://www.pandagpt.io/)

Upload a file, ask anything.

Tired of reading? Let PandaGPT handle all that for you!

不知道是不是中國開發的

Code with CGPT

[Wu Che Yu](https://www.facebook.com/story.php?story_fbid=pfbid02yzmsvFuv6gwHgUzQADu5T9tZZKgXKKar31TQqYZbMg7RHkab69wShKLaDneG3FzXl&id=100000258976889) [github.com/frank890417/image-optimizer]([https://github.com/frank890417/image-optimizer](https://github.com/frank890417/image-optimizer)

[ 想看詠唱過程~ #1 ](https://github.com/frank890417/image-optimizer/issues/1)

Debuild

Tools where a language model augments a workflow feel magical.Here's me creating Reddit client in ~2 min using Debuild. Codex does the boring stuff like write JS transformations, while I do the fun stuff like pick pretty gradients. ref from [@sharifshameem](https://twitter.com/sharifshameem)

perplexity.ai

不只可以回答問題，還會附上答案每一句的學術期刊來源，剛測試了幾題美國政治跟台灣政治的題目，都引用了幾篇不錯的期刊，從JOP, CQ, JCC, AJPS, 到AER都有...而且還會從1990的文獻一路引用到2020年...感覺這可以直接回答資格考跟幫忙文獻回顧了...ref from 王宏恩

[文案類]

Jasper：自動產生文案，你出點子它幫你完成文章

[https://jasper.ai](https://jasper.ai/)

Scalenut：給定主題與每個章節的子標題與字數，直接幫你完成文章

[https://www.scalenut.com/](https://www.scalenut.com/)

CopyAI：與Scalenut類似，給完文章架構後完成整個文章

[https://www.copy.ai/](https://www.copy.ai/)

[行銷類]

SurferSeo：編寫文章時，即刻給你SEO分數並據此修改

[https://surferseo.com/](https://surferseo.com/)

Growbots： 管理潛在客戶的名單，並追蹤、個人化 E-mail

[https://www.growbots.com/](https://www.growbots.com/)

ManyChat： 自動回覆 FB Messenger 訊息

[https://manychat.com/](https://manychat.com/)

[繪圖類]

(我現在粉專或書本上的插圖也都是 AI 自動產出，直接避免未來可能的版權問題。)

Midjourney

[https://www.midjourney.com/](https://www.midjourney.com/)

DALL-E 2

[https://openai.com/dall-e-2/](https://openai.com/dall-e-2/)

NightCafe

[https://nightcafe.studio/](https://nightcafe.studio/)

Artbreeder

[https://www.artbreeder.com/](https://www.artbreeder.com/)

DeepAI

[https://deepai.org/](https://deepai.org/)

[研究類]

Genei： 論文進去後直接幫你分段條列式抓出重點方便閱讀跟報告

[https://www.genei.io/](https://www.genei.io/)

Lateral： 自動比較不同文獻的立論、爭點、共識、結論

[https://lateral.io/](https://lateral.io/)

ResearchRabbit： 圖像化每篇論文的引用來源、作者、相關文獻

[https://www.researchrabbit.ai/](https://www.researchrabbit.ai/)

Explainpaper： 把論文看不懂的地方標註起來，給你相對應的解釋

[https://www.explainpaper.com/](https://www.explainpaper.com/)

[工具型]

Grammarly： 歷史悠久的文法檢閱軟體，檢查英文文章並建議修改方向，大推!

[https://www.grammarly.com/](https://www.grammarly.com/)

Beautiful.ai： 自動簡報設計，給定圖片或文字後自動生成簡報設計

[https://www.beautiful.ai/](https://www.beautiful.ai/)

Tome： 自動簡報設計，內建AI自動生成圖片，也可自動改寫

[ https://beta.tome.app ](https://beta.tome.app/)
